full_text:
How much has each team gotten out of their top six selections from the 2021 draft so far?

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/OWZ9bBUdPK

The people have been clamoring for hourly QB rankings. Here they are!

Rankings are based on https://t.co/ozHHxdbN9b's EPA+CPOE composite index.

#nflverse https://t.co/UUXcLc22JK

Saquon Barkley is the Jameis Winston of Running Backs.

Since entering the league, he ranks 3rd in percentage of runs over 20 yards, but 2nd in percentage of runs below 0 yards.

Like @Danny_Heifetz says, on every play, Saquon either hits a home run or strikes out.

#nflverse https://t.co/W5YgTxmCch

This updated version adds transparency to the field and to non-scoring drives. Only scoring drives end in a white point. Also added time of possession and number of plays. Still work in progress. 
#nflverse https://t.co/8L4rVSv42U
